Primary Contact: Val Richards BSW, Roots Practitioner; Phone: 250.868.0351 ext 104; Email: roots@mcsbc.org
Service Details: - Ensures that Aboriginal children and youth in care of MCFD have a placement plan to respect and preserve their Aboriginal identity and their ties to their family, community and heritage- Identifies children for whom a return to family and community may be appropriate, and assists in developing and implementing appropriate reunification plans- Implements strategies to strengthen a connection to their community and culture, as well as the community's involvement in planning for the child
Address & Map: 2949 Pandosy St, #201Kelowna, BC     V1Y 1W1View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Wheelchair accessible * on main bus route * street parking * parking lot access available with 1 hour limit
